cgcloud__Order_Item_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Order_Item_Template__c
cgcloud__Order_Item_Template__c.description: This template controls the behavior of an Order Item Template. For example, OrderEntry is an important template, which allows a sales document to behave like an order entry.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Attribute that's used to enable or disable the current template.

cgcloud__Add_Allowed__c.description: Specifies whether the user can add or scan items for the selected item type.

cgcloud__Assortment_Relation__c.description: Controls whether the assignment of products to sales document item templates within the customer selling assortment has to be considered. - No: The system doesn't consider any assignment. - Yes: The system filters the disposal list subject to the assignment. Although, the validation verifies the assignment of each product to the according sales document item template.

cgcloud__Calculation_Group__c.description: Attribute that allows to classify order item templates in order to identify the item template in a complex pricing calculation step.

cgcloud__Check_Inventory_Overdraft__c.description: Controls whether and the method by which overdrawing the user inventory is verified.

cgcloud__Check_Max_Quantity__c.description: Used to prevent adding quantities that are greater than the maximum value.

cgcloud__Check_Quota_Overdraft__c.description: Controls whether and the method by which overdrawing the quota is verified.

cgcloud__Closed_Listing__c.description: Indicates whether an order quantity for a product thatthe order listing algorithm doesn't find can be entered for this sales document item template.

cgcloud__Complex_Pricing_Relevant__c.description: Indicates whether the order item tempate can be used for complex scenarios.

cgcloud__Consider_Delivery_State__c.description: Indicates whether the delivery of a product is to be considered. For return items, the delivery state is not to be considered.

cgcloud__Creation_Platform__c.description: Indicates the platform on which this template can be used to create order documents.

cgcloud__Exclude_Order_Rounding__c.description: Indicates whether Quantity Rounding is to be excluded.

cgcloud__Explicit_Default_Unit__c.description: Default Unit Unit to preset the Order_Item.UoM. Used when Use_Product_Logistic !='Yes'.

cgcloud__Logistic_Category__c.description: Controls the logistical unit types that can be chosen for an item of this template.

cgcloud__Max_Quantity__c.description: Controls the maximum quantity that can be the orderer of any product by using this order item template.

cgcloud__Mobility_Logistic_Unit__c.description: Controls the setting of the QuantitiyLogisticUnit attribute on the Mobility when ordering a product based on this order item template.

cgcloud__Modification_Reason__c.description: Specifies whether the user must enter a reason if the preordered quantity has been modified.

cgcloud__Modification_Reasons__c.description: Reason for modification of the preordered quantity on a mobile device.

cgcloud__Movement_Direction__c.description: Indicates the type of movement that's associated with the order.

cgcloud__Permits_Printing__c.description: Controls whether the order item of this template is to be printed.

cgcloud__Policy__c.description: Specifies whether a order quantity is to be suggested in the disposal list and whether the suggestion is to be based on the ordered quantity or on the delivered (invoiced) quantity of the item.

cgcloud__Position__c.description: Determines the position of the order item template.

cgcloud__Price_Effect__c.description: Indicates the effect of the item template on the total value.

cgcloud__Quantity_Suggestion_Policy__c.description: Specifies whether a order quantity is to be suggested in the disposal list and whether the suggestion is to be based either on the ordered quantity or on the delivered (invoiced) quantity of the item.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales org to which the order item template belongs.

cgcloud__Save_Zero_Quantity__c.description: Order item based on the respective item template that's to be saved when the item has been modified but still has 0 quantity of the order item.

cgcloud__Short_Text__c.description: Short text for the item template.

cgcloud__Use_Inventory__c.description: Controls whether user inventory relationships and attributes are to be considered.

cgcloud__Use_Product_Logistic__c.description: Controls the manner in which logistics information for a product is to be considered.

cgcloud__Use_Quota__c.description: Controls whether quota relationships and attributes are to be considered.
